## 부가설명 및 특이사항
장바구니 목록에서 장바구니를 삭제하는 API 입니다.

cartNo를 List형으로 전달해야 합니다.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"cartNo","in":"query","description":"장바구니 번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1,2,3"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-access-token"},{"name":"Shop-By-Authorization","in":"header","description":"액세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"count":{"type":"number","description":"회원의 총 Cart 상품수","example":1}},"description":"","title":"cart-1843750990"},"examples":{"delete-cart":{"value":"{\"count\":1}"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
